sn51.7:4.1: “Mendicants, all the mendicants in the past …
sn51.7:4.3: present who realize the undefiled freedom of heart and freedom by wisdom in this very life, and who live having achieved it with their own insight due to the end of defilements, do so by developing and cultivating the four bases of psychic power.
sn51.7:5.2: It’s when a mendicant develops the basis for psychic power that has samādhi due to enthusiasm … energy …
sn51.7:5.5: All the mendicants in the past …
sn51.7:5.7: present who realize the undefiled freedom of heart and freedom by wisdom in this very life, and who live having achieved it with their own insight due to the end of defilements, do so by developing and cultivating these four bases of psychic power.”
